biotools.summary: Graphical, event-driven tool for copy number abnormalities/allelic-imbalance coupled analysis of whole-exome sequencing data. By using case-control matched exome data, it performs a comparative digital exonic quantification to generate CNA data and couples this information with exome-wide LOH and allelic imbalance detection.

bioschemas.name: CEQer
